Can you include DeadlyReentry configs for this mod?

> 
> Can you include DeadlyReentry configs for this mod?

My plan is to wait 'till 1.0 is out and see how they can be adapted to the stock system first. I'm not sure how relevant DRE will be after the update..

> 
> My plan is to wait 'till 1.0 is out and see how they can be adapted to the stock system first. I'm not sure how relevant DRE will be after the update..

I just looked through the release info: it isn't going to be relevent. I hope, however, that your mod requires minimal editing to fit into 1.0.

> 
> I just looked through the release info: it isn't going to be relevent. I hope, however, that your mod requires minimal editing to fit into 1.0.

This seems to be the case. It looks like most of the stock aero and heat calcs are handled through backend code instead of values in the parts. So the adaptors and cockpits should be fine. I wouldn't recommend using the engines, as those have taken more programming hits, though.

Nevermind. The nodes don't work right.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-28T07:47:06Z" title="04/28/2015 07:47  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 28, 2015</time> by CptRichardson**

> 
> Edit: Grunf I tested the symmetry that you described and I found that mirror symmetry worked fine and both engines point down, but when I switched to radial that was when the directions flipped. Double check that you are indeed in mirror symmetry and if it still doesn't work maybe post a short video or a gif so I can see what's going on ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

This week is crazy for me, so I am not sure if i can post video of bug occuring, but let me try and tell you steps on how to reproduce. It occured when i was designing this baby:

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/c3BrEiXXd7A?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

What you need (i am using 0.90 parts):

1. OPT Spaceplane parts

2. B9 Procedural wings

3. MKIV system

Steps to reproduce (2 different cases)

1. Put OPT J-Cockpit and fuselage

2. On the side, toggle radial attachment, MIRROR symmetry and attach Mk2 KFANs (radial to J-fuselage), the fans are displayed correctly

3. Attach Mk2 VTOL Turbines (the F-35 ones) to the KFANs (look at my craft in the video), also mirror symmetry. That is when i got the turbines to flip (after i pressed toggle VTOL in editor)

4. Same thing happens, if i.e. you add B9 Procedural wing, and then on that wing you put Mk IV BIG RADIAL Intakes (ones you can mount mk1 engine on)

(they can be found at [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/101699-0-90-Mark-IV-Spaceplane-System-%2814-12-14-important-fixes!%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/101699-0-90-Mark-IV-Spaceplane-System-%2814-12-14-important-fixes!%29) - look at IMGUR parts library, page 3/16, the intake that is the rightmost one)

5. When you attach your **mk1 VTOL turbine**(not sure of the name, the non f-35 one) to that intake, you get the same issue

I resolved the issue by putting each engine individually, so its not an issue.

I WILL for sure be making the "making of" that Valkyrie craft, but due to my lack of available time, it can happen it takes a week or two, so i figured i give you a faster way to reproduce and fix it :-)

At around 0:35 in the video i am highlighting the VTOL turbines, so you see what parts are being used

I would try deleting the QuizTechAero folder and install again to your GameData. If that doesn't work try downloading it again and re-installing. Check the folder too to make sure all of the parts are in there ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) If you are using 1.0 there is an issue with node connections that is affecting almost all parts mods right now, but I hope to have it fixed soon.
When are we gonna have the K-10 ?

> 
> When are we gonna have the K-10 ?

Hard to say. I've been bogged down with school, midterms, and other things, but I hope to get some more work done on it and fix some of the 1.0 issues soon. I may release it without an IVA at first but I plan to include one at some point ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
